Sections.Text: [EXTERNAL] Re: SEBP107060-001-001-001701 Grand Street Condo Association

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of BH Insurance.

Hi Jason,

I was under the impression that Guard was to be put on notice to the loss
until we better understand the cost that will be associated with the
repairs. Not for an actual claim to be opened just yet. Is this not the
case?

On Thu, Jul 16, 2020 at 11:17 AM Jason Camerano <Jason.Camerano@guard.com>
wrote:

> Veronica,
>
> I tried to call you & could not leave a vm due to the mailbox being full.
> I also tried to text you.  Below the signature line of this email, you’ll
> see my contact information. I’m in the office Monday through Friday from
> 8:00 AM until 4:30 PM EST.
>
>
>
> Email is definitely the quickest form of communication for
> questions/updates about a claim. If you are sending me a question or
> requesting a status update via email, please be sure to include your claim
> number in the subject line. Please be advised that the claims process,
> including reviews, can sometimes exceed 90 days.  *I have assigned an
> independent adjusting firm to the claim and you should hear from them
> soon.  They will be looking to gather information & schedule a site
> inspection.*
>
>
